title: Fancyine 3 Pieces Bath Rugs Sets Winter Christmas Farm Red Truck Soft Non-Slip Absorbent Toilet Seat Cover U-Shaped Toilet Mat for Bathroom Decor Rustic Wood Texture

Anti-slip and Water Absorbent: The bath room rugs set backing are reinforced with non-slip dots to prevents skidding. And the cozy plush microfiber, every time you step on the mat, you can enjoy superior comfort. Mats also absorbent water well.

Professional HD Printing: Personalized modern photo design bathroom rugs. We adopt advanced printing technology to make the image quality of rug clearer and the color is bright and fadeless, which can blend with any existing home decor.
Easy Care: Rugs Machine washable, simply toss the contour rug set into washing machine in cold water, tumble dry low. Do not bleach. Regular vacuuming helps rugs remain attractive and serviceable.
Warm Tips: Please make sure that your toilet size fit the cushion before you order it. Please allow little color difference due to difference light environment.
description: Small size(1 bath mats 30x 18 inches,1 U-shaped contour mat 14x 18inches,round toilet lid cover mats-15x 18 inches)Large size(1 large bath mats 32x 20 inches,1 U-shaped contour mat 16x 18inches,round toilet lid cover mats-16 x 20inches).

The bathroom rugs set 3 pieces has a printing pattern design soft front and a non-slip rubber dots design back.Different from other solid color boring bath mats,it can easy match classic, modern, vintage, country,farmhouse style,decorate your home.
Machine washable, wash cold with mild detergent, dries quickly on tumble dry low temperature. Do not bleach.
